brief.product_service: Online coding bootcamp and career transition programs
brief.primary_goal: Enroll 500 students in Q2 cohort and establish market leadership in career switchers segment
brief.target_audience: Career switchers aged 25-40 seeking high-income tech roles without traditional CS degrees
brief.positioning_summary: Results-driven coding bootcamp with 92% job placement rate, focused on real-world skills and career outcomes.
